function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate control of temperature leading to excessively high indoor temperatures","Impact":"Loss of productivity and performance due to high indoor temperatures","Mitigation":"Proper HVAC systems and temperature control, effective use of ventilation and shading","Technologies":"HVAC systems, temperature control systems, ventilation systems, shading systems","People":"Occupants, employees","Owner":"Building managers, facility management"}]}
